entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:57AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Chinook Warming Pattern This Weekend Through Early Next Week... After several weeks of a cold and snowy pattern, a chinook warming pattern will bring substantially warmer air into the southern Interior from the Alaska Range up across the Tanana Valley. entry.title: High Wind Watch issued January 19 at 11:00AM MST until January 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night.
